thread.title: Tors’ Tony Garrido leads highly improved running attack
thread.title_full: Tors’ Tony Garrido leads highly improved running attack

author: JAMES LACOMBE
title: Tors’ Tony Garrido leads highly improved running attack
text:
County deliberates costs to implement body cameras 
GALVESTON — A box of about four dozen unused body cameras, which were purchased through a grant, have been sitting in the sheriff’s office for months. Although a few are used by deputies in the Galveston County Jail, officials say the high cost of putting cameras on patrol deputies is the biggest hurdle to overcome. Posted: 12:45 am | Comments (4) AP News
